long_description: This Delta Cycle Smartphone Caddy II offers a wide platform to fit larger smartphones and cases for easy access and viewing when you're riding, and it includes an all-weather water-resistant bag. Plastic construction stands up to wear and tear, rubber bumpers grip and cushion device, and water-resistant bag protects your smartphone from splashes and rain. Designed to securely hold iPhone, Droid, Blackberry and various other smartphones; fits phones up to 5.5 x 2.9 x 0.625 in. (including most Android 4.3 in. phones). Includes handlebar and stem mounts; felt bumpers are included to customize the fit between various phones and cases. Viewing angle can be set to your preference. Please note: the Delta Cycle Smartphone Caddy II has a suggested use with road or commuter bicycles.
short_description: This Delta Cycle Smartphone Caddy II offers a wide platform to fit larger smartphones and cases for easy access and viewing when you're riding, and it includes an all-weather water-resistant bag.
